00228 class EGS_IPLANES_EXPORT EGS_RadialRepeater : public EGS_BaseGeometry {
00229 
00230 public:
00231 
00232     EGS_RadialRepeater(const EGS_Vector &Xo, const EGS_Vector &A, int np,
00233                        EGS_BaseGeometry *G, EGS_Float first=0, const string &Name = "");
00234 
00235     ~EGS_RadialRepeater();
00236 
00237     bool isInside(const EGS_Vector &x) {
00238         return true;
00239     };
00240 
00241     int isWhere(const EGS_Vector &x) {
00242         int ir = iplanes->isWhere(x);
00243         //EGS_Vector xp = x*R[ir];
00244         EGS_Vector xp = (x-xo)*R[ir];
00245         int il = g->isWhere(xp);
00246         return il >= 0 ? ir*ng + il : nreg-1;
00247     };
00248 
00249     int medium(int ireg) const {
00250         if (ireg < 0 || ireg >= nreg) {
00251             return -1;
00252         }
00253         if (ireg == nreg-1) {
00254             return med;
00255         }
00256         int ir = ireg/ng;
00257         int il = ireg - ir*ng;
00258         return g->medium(il);
00259     };
00260 
00261     int inside(const EGS_Vector &x) {
00262         return isWhere(x);
00263     };
00264 
00265     int howfar(int ireg, const EGS_Vector &x, const EGS_Vector &u,
00266                EGS_Float &t, int *newmed = 0, EGS_Vector *normal = 0) {
00267         if (ireg < 0) {
00268             egsFatal("\nEGS_RadialRepeater::howfar: position can not"
00269                      " be outside\n");
00270             return ireg;
00271         }
00272         //egsWarning("\nhowfar(ir=%d x=(%g,%g,%g) u=(%g,%g,%g) t=%g)\n",
00273         //        ireg,x.x,x.y,x.z,u.x,u.y,u.z,t);
00274         if (ireg < nreg-1) {  // in the repeated geometry
00275             int ir = ireg/ng;
00276             int il = ireg - ir*ng;
00277             //EGS_Vector xp = x*R[ir], up = u*R[ir];
00278             EGS_Vector xp = (x-xo)*R[ir], up = u*R[ir];
00279             //egsWarning("In repetition %d: xp=(%g,%g,%g) up=(%g,%g,%g)\n",
00280             //      ir,xp.x,xp.y,xp.z,up.x,up.y,up.z);
00281             int inew = g->howfar(il,xp,up,t,newmed,normal);
00282             //egsWarning("il=%d inew=%d t=%d\n",il,inew,t);
00283             if (inew < 0) {
00284                 if (normal) {
00285                     *normal = R[ir]*(*normal);
00286                 }
00287                 inew = nreg-1;
00288                 if (newmed) {
00289                     *newmed = med;
00290                 }
00291             }
00292             else {
00293                 inew += ir*ng;
00294             }
00295             return inew;
00296         }
00297         // outside of the replicas
00298         int ir = iplanes->isWhere(x);
00299         //egsWarning("outside repetions, ir=%d\n",ir);
00300         EGS_Float t_left = t;
00301         EGS_Vector xtmp(x);
00302         EGS_Float ttot = 0;
00303         //EGS_Vector tmp_n;
00304         //EGS_Vector *norm = normal ? &tmp_n : 0;
00305         while (1) {
00306             EGS_Float this_t = t_left;
00307             //EGS_Vector xp = xtmp*R[ir], up = u*R[ir];
00308             EGS_Vector xp = (xtmp-xo)*R[ir], up = u*R[ir];
00309             //egsWarning("xtmp=(%g,%g,%g)\n",xtmp.x,xtmp.y,xtmp.z);
00310             //egsWarning("xp=(%g,%g,%g) up=(%g,%g,%g)\n",xp.x,xp.y,xp.z,up.x,up.y,up.z);
00311             int inew = g->howfar(-1,xp,up,this_t,newmed,normal);
00312             //egsWarning("inew=%d t=%g\n",inew,this_t);
00313             if (inew >= 0) {
00314                 t = ttot + this_t;
00315                 if (normal) {
00316                     *normal = R[ir]*(*normal);
00317                 }
00318                 return ir*ng + inew;
00319             }
00320             int next_ir = iplanes->howfar(ir,xtmp,u,this_t,0,0);
00321             //egsWarning("next sector: %d t=%g\n",next_ir,this_t);
00322             if (next_ir == ir) {
00323                 return ireg;
00324             }
00325             ttot += this_t;
00326             t_left -= this_t;
00327             xtmp += u*this_t;
00328             ir = next_ir;
00329         }
00330     };
00331 
00332     EGS_Float hownear(int ireg, const EGS_Vector &x) {
00333         if (ireg < 0) {
00334             egsFatal("EGS_RadialRepeater::hownear: position can not"
00335                      " be outside\n");
00336             return 0;
00337         }
00338         if (ireg < nreg-1) {  // in the repeated geometry
00339             int ir = ireg/ng;
00340             int il = ireg - ir*ng;
00341             EGS_Vector xp = x*R[ir];
00342             return g->hownear(il,xp);
00343         }
00344         // outside of the replicas
00345         int ir = iplanes->isWhere(x);
00346         EGS_Vector xp = x*R[ir];
00347         return g->hownear(-1,xp);
00348     };
00349 
00350     int getMaxStep() const {
00351         return nrep*(g->getMaxStep() + 1);
00352     };
00353 
00354     const string &getType() const {
00355         return type;
00356     };
00357 
00358     void printInfo() const;
00359 
00360     void setRLabels(EGS_Input *input);
00361     virtual void getLabelRegions(const string &str, vector<int> &regs);
00362 
00363 protected:
00364 
00365     EGS_IPlanes        *iplanes;
00366     EGS_BaseGeometry   *g;
00367     EGS_RotationMatrix *R;
00368 
00369     EGS_Vector         xo;
00370 
00371     int                nrep, ng;
00372     EGS_Float          phi_o;
00373 
00374     static string      type;
00375 
00376 
00377 };
00378

00380 #endif
